title: New Option After Death: Human Composting
info: Human composting involves placing a human corpse in a cylindrical vessel with organic material like wood and alfalfa to speed up decomposition. After a month, the remains are reduced into a rich soil that can be used for planting.
question: Would you vote yes or no on legalization of  human composting as a burial alternative to broaden death care choices?
